share on x fc fran carter. jun 14 at 2:17 pm louise, i will always remember good times with you and geoge square dancing... that must have been at least a hundred years ago! lifting you and your family up in prayer for comfort and peace... may god bless you all. fran carter. comment share comment share facebook twitter share on x jun 13 at 10:39 pm simply elegant spathiphyllum was purchased for the family of george a. brown. share on x sp steve patterson. jun 13 at 6:28 pm sandy and sandra, so sorry to hear of your dad's passing. rest assured he will be sorely missed by his many, many friends. may god bless and watch over his family during this trying time. comment share comment share facebook twitter share on x bj brenda jones. jun 13 at 6:02 pm i'm so sorry to hear about george. i remember he and louise at ball games all those years ago, lots of good memories brenda wright jones. comment share comment share facebook twitter share on x gc gilita carter. jun 13 at 3:10 pm george was an all around fine man! don thought the world of him and i'm sure he was one of many family and friends welcoming him to his heavenly home! i've known george my whole life and he always had his work cut out for him driving with sandy, susan and me in the front seat! great memories until we all meet again! love, gilita4 comments share comment share facebook twitter share on x more memories... visitation. jun 14. 6:00 pm - 9:00 pm finch-cochran funeral homep. o. box 39 1478 blue ridge dr. mc. caysville, ga, us, 30555. get missed the service? send flowers or gifts to the family's home. traditional service. jun 15. 2:00 pm finch-cochran funeral homep. o. box 39 1478 blue ridge dr. mc. caysville, ga, us, 30555. get order flowers now for george's traditional service wall 365 days of grief support. subscribe facebook cochran family of funeral service website designed by funeralone contact obituaries about store

"david and janett blackwell. comment share comment share facebook twitter
